attributes.action: Make sure Harry Styles and Taylor Swift release at least one song together
attributes.additional_details: I want this to happen because I feel as though it would have a significant positive impact on society as a whole, as they are both figures who are greatly admired, so I imagine if they released a song together, it would be incredibly well received not only in the UK, but across the whole world. This would reflect well on the UK, giving us a better reputation than how we are perceived currently
attributes.background: I would appreciate it highly if the government or parliament could communicate with those who manage both Taylor Swift and Harry Styles in the hope of getting them together to write, produce and release at least one song together, as I feel it would be incredibly beneficial to society

rejection.details: This is a matter for the individual artists and their record companies, not the UK Government or Parliament.
